transcript.text: [Music]
what's going on ladies and gentlemen
so as you probably know by now this this
charlottesville protest story is
sweeping the nation so much so that even
in my backyard of seattle there's some
protests going on today in response to
those protests that went on right there
so to give some clarity this to this
issue i just want to give you guys some
of my thoughts on it here today now
first of all what happened right well a
group calling themselves the unite the
right movement got a few thousand people
together to basically protest their
right to free speech in Charlottesville
Virginia and it was all headed by that
guy Jason Kessler right there now rather
than listen to the corporate media and
believe that it was a bunch of Nazi KKK
white supremacist peoples getting
together I went to his Twitter himself
and went back a few weeks to kind of get
his own philosophies on life and whatnot
to see what it was all about right
rather than listen to the media and
honestly you know what I found was a
very conservative leaning dude now
there's a few maybe ideological
differences that I have with the guy and
I'm sure there's some information that I
could shed some light on for him but I
did not see a bigot I did not see a
racist I saw a dude with his own
philosophies on life that just wanted to
get him and his friends together and
voice their opinions in Charlottesville
Virginia right and that's what breeds
that brings us to this second point and
as we know those protests in Virginia
turned very violent so much so that
there was even a black Dodge Challenger
rammed into a crowd
blatantly on purpose I mean this thing
was speeding it did not slow down so you
know what really happened
do
these people just gathered together to
incite violence I don't think that's the
case because what's often the case at
protests and things that go on like that
is that there are paid provocateurs
there whether they're private
contractors mercenaries or you know paid
to do these things we know and we have

provocateurs at protests around the
country to simply incite violence and
make things look bad
now with that Dodge Challenger getting
ran into that crowd I mean a it was a
nice car I don't know who's gonna waste
a nice car like that be it was
registered to a 20 year old out of Ohio
that's pretty odd so there's just a lot
of things that don't logically add up
right so I think we're safe to say that
it was most likely I mean we don't know
but most likely the case that yes this
was a purposeful thing done at an honest
protest to take advantage of the
situation right and that leaves us to
this point right here the mainstream
media I don't even want to say the
mainstream media I would say the powers
that be the the elite the Cabal they
knew that this event was going to occur
and they saw an opportunity with it they
saw an opportunity to divide and conquer
not only are they doing this like I've
written here racially right they're
labeling as everybody who attended in

outright racist nationalist peoples and
you know everybody against it as
progressive compassionate
well-thought-out liberal vote actually
liberal folk also not only they are
doing it racially they're doing it
politically as well I kind of intertwine
those but they are using this the
mainstream media the powers to be the
powers that be with their mainstream

using this to divide and conquer to
divide us racially to divide us
politically to make one group of people
hate the other group of people so we
continue to go nowhere
society and they can continue to reign
right so that was done and we see that
playing out especially on CNN an article
I just saw you know labeling this whole
all right movement is a bunch of racist
bigots and what's also going on last
bullet point here is that the the MSM or
the powers-that-be they're using this
divide and conquer strategy to basically
put people not only divide people but
put them into the respective boxes in

lot of these conspiracy theorists or

went lost its mind how America lost his
mind and this whole article was
basically a slammed piece against
conservatives you know people supporting
Trump and labeling them all conspiracy
theories and how you know how these
people getting away from the
conventional way of thinking
are crazy right so that's what's going
on with these protests it just plays
into the whole narrative that the
powers-that-be want they want to divide
us so they can rule over us but we can't
let that happen we cannot let this whole

watching a live video of this pretty

protests yesterday bunch of thick
accents but they actually had some black
dudes in their group and we've got to
understand that it's not about black
versus white it's not about liberal

those dualities right understand that
we're not gonna be divided we're not

it's that same power that not only

they're trying to invite insight all
